item.title: Who would win in a fight between 100 men and one gorilla?
Mark Carney’s wife, children, and family life as Canadian election begins
item.description: Mark Carney met his English wife Diana when they were both members of the Oxford University Ice Hockey Club.

item.title: Mystery of the Bennington Triangle where people keep going missing
item.description: Five missing people, tall-tales of a big foot and man-eating rock; welcome to Bennington, Vermont.

item.title: Valerie the sausage dog ‘fit and well’ after 529 days alone in Australian bush
item.description: Volunteers spent an estimated 1,000 hours and travelled more than 3,000 miles around the island searching for Valerie before she was caught using came...

item.title: Receipt artist creates supermarket bills with A to Z of items and a Trump prank
item.description: You cannot guess what he used for Z.
